## CommandOptionDescription type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CommandOptionDescription = {
    description: string;
    type: 'string' | 'number' | 'boolean' | 'count';
    aliases?: string[];
    array?: boolean;
    choices?: Array<string | number>;
    configParser?: (configPath: string) => object;
    config?: boolean;
    required?: boolean;
    requiresArgs?: boolean;
    coerce?: (arg: unknown) => unknown;
    default?: unknown;
    implies?: string | string;
    conflicts?: string | string[];
    nargs?: number;
    normalize?: boolean;
    deprecated?: boolean;
};
```
